title: Find A Practitioner | The Institute for Functional Medicine
description: Looking for a functional medicine doctor or clinician? IFM has the largest referral network in functional medicine. Find a practitioner today!
cleaned_text: The Largest Referral Network in Functional Medicine The Find A Practitioner referral network is designed to locate functional medicine practitioners who meet your needs. We provide a comprehensive, searchable network of clinicians in various specialties and healthcare professions. All practitioners in our network have attended IFM's five-day foundational course, Applying Functional Medicine in Clinical Practice (AFMCP). They are also current IFM members. [Learn More](https://www.ifm.org/afmcp) Those featuring an "IFM Certified Practitioner" badge are licensed and practicing healthcare professionals who have completed the IFM Certification Program, which is the highest level of education available in functional medicine. [Learn More](https://www.ifm.org/certification-membership/certification-program/) Once you have narrowed down your search, IFM provides additional resources to help prepare you for the next steps in your functional medicine journey.
